text: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard is a video game of the Party game type for PlayStation 3, Windows, Nintendo DS, and Wii. It was developed by Phoenix Interactive and published by Ubisoft, and was released in 2009.https://www.jeuxvideo.com/jeux/jeu-67624/#details == Reception == * Jeuxvideo.com: 10/20 (Nintendo DS), 8/20 (PS3), 8/20 (PC), 9/20 (Wii) * Gamekult: 5/10 == References == Category:2009 video games Category:Ubisoft games Category:Wii games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Nintendo DS games
title: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard (video game)
